title: Maegami Tarou
synopsis: This is a folk-tale-like adventure story of an active boy on a quest for the Water of Life. The boy sets out on this quest after learning that the Water of Life is needed to make his village happy.
staff: [['Saitou, Hiroshi', ['Director']], ['Momose, Yoshiyuki', ['Character Design', ' Animation Director']], ['Kawamoto, Shouhei', ['Art Director']], ['Takano, Noboru', ['Animation Director']]]
